item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Fly tipping/ overloaded bin, 28th June
item.description:
Consistent issue with this green bin left on street, fly tipping means it is overloaded and rubbish constantly blows down the rest of the street. Please clear and consider removing bin.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Grove Lane, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars regularly blocking pavement, 28th June
item.description:
Cars are regularly parked side by side at the end of Freda Street (junction with marine street) making it difficult for pedestrians, cyclists and wheelchair users to pass out of the end of this pedestrianised street. Clearer signage and stronger enforcement are needed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Freda Street, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car hasnt moved for 2 months, 28th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harvey Gardens, Charlton Riverside, London
